p: Many affected people were administered with antipyretic agents for fever relief during the COVID-19 outbreak. Many of these medicines include acetaminophen, a medication believed to inflict serious harm to the liver and/or trigger liver failure [ 30]. Acetaminophen is also known as APAP (acetyl-para-aminophenol) in the USA and paracetamol in Europe, is one of the most widely used antipyretics and analgesics medications in the world [ 41].
